databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME as MS_VESSEL_ITEM_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME as MS_LO_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.JRY_COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME as MS_TANI_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TANKA , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NOUHINBI , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER , OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM INNER JOIN OD_JRY_ITEM ON OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
WHERE OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0

SELECT OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME as MS_VESSEL_ITEM_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME as MS_LO_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.JRY_COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME as MS_TANI_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TANKA , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NOUHINBI , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER , OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM INNER JOIN OD_JRY_ITEM ON OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
WHERE OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID

SELECT OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME as MS_VESSEL_ITEM_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME as MS_LO_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.JRY_COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME as MS_TANI_NAME, OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TANKA , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NOUHINBI , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER , OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM INNER JOIN OD_JRY_ITEM ON OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
WHERE OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID

SELECT OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.JRY_COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TANKA , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NOUHINBI , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_JRY_ITEM ON OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID AND OD_JRY_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*受領品目*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*受領*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_MK ON OD_MK.OD_MK_ID = OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*見積回答*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_MM ON OD_MM.OD_MM_ID = OD_MK.OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*見積依頼*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_THI ON OD_THI.OD_THI_ID = OD_MM.OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*手配以来*/
WHERE (OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0) AND (OD_JRY.STATUS >= :OD_JRY_STATUS) AND (OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID) AND (OD_JRY.JRY_DATE BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE)

SELECT OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.JRY_COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TANKA , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NOUHINBI , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_JRY_ITEM ON OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID AND OD_JRY_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*受領品目*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*受領*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_MK ON OD_MK.OD_MK_ID = OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*見積回答*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_MM ON OD_MM.OD_MM_ID = OD_MK.OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*見積依頼*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_THI ON OD_THI.OD_THI_ID = OD_MM.OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*手配以来*/
WHERE (OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0) AND (OD_JRY.STATUS >= :OD_JRY_STATUS) AND (OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID) AND (OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID) AND (OD_JRY.JRY_DATE BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE)

SELECT OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.JRY_COUNT , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TANKA , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NOUHINBI , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_JRY_ITEM ON OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID AND OD_JRY_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*受領品目*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*受領*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_MK ON OD_MK.OD_MK_ID = OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*見積回答*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_MM ON OD_MM.OD_MM_ID = OD_MK.OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*見積依頼*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_THI ON OD_THI.OD_THI_ID = OD_MM.OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 /*手配以来*/
WHERE (OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0) AND (OD_JRY.STATUS >= :OD_JRY_STATUS) AND (OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID) AND (OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID) AND (OD_JRY.JRY_DATE BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE)

INSERT INTO OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM ( OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_LO_ID , COUNT , JRY_COUNT , MS_TANI_ID , TANKA , BIKOU , NOUHINBI , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS , CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER ) VALUES ( :OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , :OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , :SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , :MS_LO_ID , :COUNT , :JRY_COUNT , :MS_TANI_ID , :TANKA , :BIKOU , :NOUHINBI , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS , :CANCEL_FLAG , :SHOW_ORDER )

UPDATE OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM SET OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = :OD_JRY_ITEM_ID , SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME = :SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID , COUNT = :COUNT , JRY_COUNT = :JRY_COUNT , MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID , TANKA = :TANKA , BIKOU = :BIKOU , NOUHINBI = :NOUHINBI ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER
WHERE OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID = :OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
DELETE FROM OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM WHERE OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID = :OD_JRY_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
